mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.order_no AS "orderNo", a.order_date AS "orderDate", a.transport_method AS "transportMethod", a.carrier_code AS "carrierCode", a.carrier_name AS "carrierName", a.car_type AS "carType", a.principal_code AS "principalCode", a.principal_name AS "principalName", a.ship_code AS "shipCode", a.ship_name AS "shipName", a.ship_city_id AS "shipCityId", a.ship_city_name AS "shipCityName", a.origin AS "origin", a.consignee_code AS "consigneeCode", a.consignee_name AS "consigneeName", a.consignee_city_id AS "consigneeCityId", a.consignee_city_name AS "consigneeCityName", a.destination AS "destination", a.owner_code AS "ownerCode", a.owner_name AS "ownerName", a.supplier_code AS "supplierCode", a.supplier_name AS "supplierName", a.sku_code AS "skuCode", a.sku_name AS "skuName", a.sku_class AS "skuClass", a.qty AS "qty", a.qty_cs AS "qtyCs", a.qty_pl AS "qtyPl", a.weight AS "weight", a.volume AS "volume", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.data_sources AS "dataSources", a.is_fee AS "isFee"
LEFT JOIN bms_sku_classification bsc ON a.sku_class = bsc.code AND a.org_id = bsc.id LEFT JOIN sys_office b ON a.org_id = b.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bms_waybill_data ( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, order_no, order_date, transport_method, carrier_code, carrier_name, car_type, principal_code, principal_name, ship_code, ship_name, ship_city_id, ship_city_name, origin, consignee_code, consignee_name, consignee_city_id, consignee_city_name, destination, owner_code, owner_name, supplier_code, supplier_name, sku_code, sku_name, sku_class, qty, qty_cs, qty_pl, weight, volume, org_id, data_sources, is_fee ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{orderNo}, #{orderDate}, #{transportMethod}, #{carrierCode}, #{carrierName}, #{carType}, #{principalCode}, #{principalName}, #{shipCode}, #{shipName}, #{shipCityId}, #{shipCityName}, #{origin}, #{consigneeCode}, #{consigneeName}, #{consigneeCityId}, #{consigneeCityName}, #{destination}, #{ownerCode}, #{ownerName}, #{supplierCode}, #{supplierName}, #{skuCode}, #{skuName}, #{skuClass}, #{qty}, #{qtyCs}, #{qtyPl}, #{weight}, #{volume}, #{orgId}, #{dataSources}, #{isFee} )

INSERT INTO bms_waybill_data( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, order_no, order_date, transport_method, carrier_code, carrier_name, car_type, principal_code, principal_name, ship_code, ship_name, ship_city_id, ship_city_name, origin, consignee_code, consignee_name, consignee_city_id, consignee_city_name, destination, owner_code, owner_name, supplier_code, supplier_name, sku_code, sku_name, sku_class, qty, qty_cs, qty_pl, weight, volume, org_id, data_sources, is_fee ) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.createBy.id}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.updateBy.id}, #{item.updateDate}, #{item.remarks}, #{item.delFlag}, #{item.orderNo}, #{item.orderDate}, #{item.transportMethod}, #{item.carrierCode}, #{item.carrierName}, #{item.carType}, #{item.principalCode}, #{item.principalName}, #{item.shipCode}, #{item.shipName}, #{item.shipCityId}, #{item.shipCityName}, #{item.origin}, #{item.consigneeCode}, #{item.consigneeName}, #{item.consigneeCityId}, #{item.consigneeCityName}, #{item.destination}, #{item.ownerCode}, #{item.ownerName}, #{item.supplierCode}, #{item.supplierName}, #{item.skuCode}, #{item.skuName}, #{item.skuClass}, #{item.qty}, #{item.qtyCs}, #{item.qtyPl}, #{item.weight}, #{item.volume}, #{item.orgId}, #{item.dataSources}, #{item.isFee} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bms_waybill_data SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, order_no = #{orderNo}, order_date = #{orderDate}, transport_method = #{transportMethod}, carrier_code = #{carrierCode}, carrier_name = #{carrierName}, car_type = #{carType}, principal_code = #{principalCode}, principal_name = #{principalName}, ship_code = #{shipCode}, ship_name = #{shipName}, ship_city_id = #{shipCityId}, ship_city_name = #{shipCityName}, origin = #{origin}, consignee_code = #{consigneeCode}, consignee_name = #{consigneeName}, consignee_city_id = #{consigneeCityId}, consignee_city_name = #{consigneeCityName}, destination = #{destination}, owner_code = #{ownerCode}, owner_name = #{ownerName}, supplier_code = #{supplierCode}, supplier_name = #{supplierName}, sku_code = #{skuCode}, sku_name = #{skuName}, sku_class = #{skuClass}, qty = #{qty}, qty_cs = #{qtyCs}, qty_pl = #{qtyPl}, weight = #{weight}, volume = #{volume}, org_id = #{orgId}, data_sources = #{dataSources}, is_fee = #{isFee} WHERE id = #{id}
